title: Problems installing the client
body: Well, I have some problems when I'm installing the league of legends client to my computer. When it's installing C++ 2005 ,  the error 1935 comes up and the installing stopped. I've tried different methods on the internet but they are not working. PLS help me , thx:D

replies.body: Based on the information provided, this could be happening for a few reasons like a faulty product feature (Mcirosoft Visual C++) or even a permissions issue preventing the installation.  As a first step, you can download and reinstall the [Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable Package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up but let me know and we can go from there!
